action.action-desc: Mr. Fallon (for himself and Mr. Himes) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence

form.official-title: To amend the Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2016 to ensure that Congress is notified of the deployment or transfer of containerized missile systems by Russia, China, or Iran.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Container Missile Notification Act.

section.header: Notice of deployment or transfer of containerized missile systems by Russia, China, or Iran
section.text: Section 501 of the Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2016 (division M of Public Law 114–113; 129 Stat. 2923) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking the Russian Federation each place it appears and inserting a covered country;
by striking Club-K container missile system each place it appears and inserting missile launcher disguised as or concealed in a shipping container;

subparagraph.text: by striking deploy, the and inserting deploy, a; and
by striking the Russian military and inserting the military of the covered country;

paragraph.text: by striking subsection (c) and inserting the following new subsection:
The term appropriate congressional committees means the following:

subparagraph.text: The Committees on Armed Services of the House of Representatives and the Senate.
The Committee on Foreign Affairs of the House of Representatives and the Committee on Foreign Relations of the Senate.

paragraph.text: The term covered country means the following:
in the heading, by striking CLUB–K CONTAINER MISSILE SYSTEM BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION and inserting containerized missile system by Russia or certain other countries.
